cross_training_opportunities: Senior dev to mentor mid-level dev on advanced security patterns to reduce key-person dependency.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required, but could accelerate timeline by ~25%.
cost_optimization: Current team is sufficient and cost-effective.
future_scaling: Can handle 30-40% more work with current team before burnout risk.

cross_training_opportunities: Train senior backend developer in basic CI/CD maintenance and emergency response.
contractor_augmentation_option: A full-time DevOps engineer could be hired to accelerate infrastructure work and reduce risk.
cost_optimization: Part-time lead is cost-effective but creates a single-point-of-failure risk.
future_scaling: Cannot handle significant additional infrastructure work without increased allocation or hiring.

cross_training_opportunities: Can be trained to write component-level tests to offload developers.
cost_optimization: Current allocation is sufficient. Low utilization suggests capacity for other projects or deeper testing.
